uk.ac.man.cs.mig.util.graph.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultController

    public interface Controller
    User: matthewhorridge
    The Univeristy Of Manchester
    Medical Informatics Group
    Date: Jan 9, 2004

    matthew.horridge@cs.man.ac.uk
    www.cs.man.ac.uk/~horridgm

    A controller, which ties together the various models and views.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener lsnr)
      Adds a property change listener, which is informed when properties such as renderers, factories etc.
      EdgeFactory getEdgeFactory()
      Gets the factory that produces Edges
      EdgeLabelRenderer getEdgeLabelRenderer()
      Gets the renderer that is used to retrieve the labels for Edges.
      EdgeRenderer getEdgeRenderer()
      Gets the renderer that is used to paint Edges
      GraphFactory getGraphFactory()
      Gets the factory used to produce Graphs
      GraphGenerator getGraphGenerator()
      Returns the GraphGenerator which is responsible for creating and maintaining the Graph that represents the list of objects held by the VisualisedObject manager.
      GraphLayoutEngine getGraphLayoutEngine()
      Returns the GraphLayoutEngine, which is capable of sizing and positioning Nodes and Edges.
      GraphModel getGraphModel()
      Returns the GraphModel, which is an interface to the underlying data that is represented by the Graph.
      GraphSelectionModel getGraphSelectionModel()
      Returns the selection model that is responsible for managing user interaction in the form of Node and Edge selections.
      GraphView getGraphView()
      Retrieves the GraphView currently attached to the Controller
      NodeFactory getNodeFactory()
      Gets the factory used to produce Nodes.
      NodeLabelRenderer getNodeLabelRenderer()
      Gets the renderer used to generate labels for Nodes.
      NodeRenderer getNodeRenderer()
      Gets the renderer used to paint Nodes
      VisualisedObjectManager getVisualisedObjectManager()
      Returns the VisualisedObjectManager which is responsible for keeping track of the objects being visualised (and hence contained in the Graph).
      void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener lsnr)
      Removes a previously added PropertyChangeListener.
      void setEdgeFactory(EdgeFactory factory)
      Sets the factory used to produce Edges
      void setEdgeLabelRenderer(EdgeLabelRenderer edgeLabelRenderer)
      Sets the renderer used to determine the labels for Edges.
      void setEdgeRenderer(EdgeRenderer renderer)
      Sets the renderer that is responsible for renderering Edges.
      void setGraphFactory(GraphFactory factory)
      Sets the factory used to produce Graphs
      void setGraphGenerator(GraphGenerator generator)
      Sets the GraphGenerator, which is used to create a Graph that is based on the contents held by the VisualisedObjectManager
      void setGraphLayoutEngine(GraphLayoutEngine layoutEngine)
      Sets the GraphLayoutEngine, which is used to size and position Nodes and Edges
      void setGraphModel(GraphModel model)
      Sets the GraphModel, which is an interface to the underlying data that is represented by the Graph
      void setGraphSelectionModel(GraphSelectionModel model)
      Sets the selection model that is responsible for managing user interaction in the form of <Node and Edge selections.
      void setGraphView(GraphView view)
      Sets the view that is used paint the Graph on.
      void setNodeFactory(NodeFactory factory)
      Sets the factory used to produce Nodes.
      void setNodeLabelRenderer(NodeLabelRenderer renderer)
      Sets the renderer that is responsible for getting the label for a given Node.
      void setNodeRenderer(NodeRenderer renderer)
      Sets the renderer that is responsible for drawing Nodes
      void setVisualisedObjectManager(VisualisedObjectManager manager)
      Sets the VisualisedObjectManager that is responsible for keeping track of objects contained in the Graph

        The VisualisedObjectManager that isShown details of the objects from the GraphModel that are being visualised.
